description.translate: Insatiable for blood, no spatter alters you.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Manteau de sang\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Insatiable pour le sang, aucune\"}","{\"text\":\"§7éclaboussure ne t'altère.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Insatiable for blood,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7no spatter alters you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§a1 §7HAS§a1\"}"],color:11012662}}
